replies.msg:
Cathay Dragon today (08SEP17) announced service resumption date for Hong Kong – Tokyo Haneda route. The oneWorld carrier previously announced it’ll cancel this route from 29OCT17, however the latest adjustment sees the airline resuming this service on 01MAR18 (from HKG).

Airbus A321 aircraft operates this route.

KA396 HKG2355 – 0455+1HND 321 D
KA397 HND0625 – 1040HKG 321 D

Schedule listed above is effective 01MAR18 – 24MAR18.

同UO撞晒時間


本來係撞622/623
而家撞624/625

我覺得無咩分別
都估到佢唔會咁易放咗羽田個slot
